大当たり: (おおあたり) - big hit; big prize; bumper crop; striking it rich; right on the mark; bonanza; bull's eye; bullseye
大当り: (おおあたり) - big hit; big prize; bumper crop; striking it rich; right on the mark; bonanza; bull's eye; bullseye
大形: (おおがた) - large; large scale; big; jumbo
大役: (たいやく) - important task/important role/great duty/important mission; major part (e.g. in a movie)
大往生を遂げる: (だいおうじょうをとげる) - to die peacefully; to have lived a full life
大待宵草: (オオマツヨイグサ) - red-sepaled evening primrose (Oenothera erythrosepala)
大御: (おおむ) - august (in ref. to the emperor or the gods); imperial; divine
大御代: (おおみよ) - glorious reign of the Emperor
大御宝: (おおみたから) - imperial subjects; the people
大御所: (おおごしょ) - leading figure; influential figure; mogul
大御所時代: (おおごしょじだい) - Ogosho period (between the Kansei Reforms and the Tempo Reforms, approx. 1787-1843)
大循環: (だいじゅんかん) - systemic circulation; general circulation (of the atmosphere)
大念仏: (だいねんぶつ) - loudly reciting Amithaba's name
大急ぎで: (おおいそぎで) - in a big hurry
大恋愛: (だいれんあい) - great love; passionate affair
大恩: (だいおん) - great debt of gratitude; great obligation
大恩人: (だいおんじん) - great benefactor; person to whom one is greatly indebted
大悟の境に入る: (だいごのきょうにはいる) - to attain enlightenment
大悟徹底: (たいごてってい) - (yoji) attain divine enlightenment; perceive absolute truth; experience spiritual awakening
大惚け: (おおぼけ) - great idiot; fool; (saying) something silly or stupid
大惨事: (だいさんじ) - great disaster; horrible tragedy; catastrophe; catastrophic event; catastrophic incident; dire calamity; terrible disaster; apocalypse
大意: (たいい) - synopsis; precis; summary; gist; outline
大感謝: (だいかんしゃ) - big thanks; great gratitude
大慈大悲: (だいじだいひ) - (yoji) great compassion and mercy
大慌て: (おおあわて) - great haste; mad rush
大憲章: (だいけんしょう) - the Magna Carta
大成: (たいせい) - completion; accomplishment; attainment of greatness or success
大成教: (たいせいきょう) - Taiseikyo (sect of Shinto)
大成者: (たいせいしゃ) - person who achieves perfection; person who perfects (e.g. a theory)
大戦: (たいせん) - great war; great battle
大戸: (おおと) - main door at the front of a house; front shutters
大所: (おおどこ) - wealthy family; important person; bigwig
大所高所: (たいしょこうしょ) - (yoji) broad perspective
大手: (おおで) - full length of one's arm (from shoulder to fingertip)
大手を振る: (おおてをふる) - to swing one's arms greatly while walking; to be brazen
大手企業: (おおてきぎょう) - leading company; major firm
大手柄: (おおてがら) - glorious achievement; distinguished service
大手毬: (オオデマリ) - Japanese snowball; Viburnum plicatum
大手筋: (おおてすじ) - large-scale operators; big traders
大手行: (おおてこう) - major banks; leading banks
大手術: (だいしゅじゅつ) - major surgery; major operation
大手銀行: (おおてぎんこう) - major bank; big bank
大手電気メーカー: (おおてでんきメーカー) - major electrical manufacturer; major company manufacturing electric devices
大打撃: (だいだげき) - serious damage; injury or loss; heavy blow
大技: (おおわざ) - bold move; great task or feat
大抵: (taitei) - principalmente, ordinariamente, geralmente, em geral; provavelmente, principalmente, ordinariamente, geralmente, em geral; provavelmente; a maioria, quase todos; comum
大挙: (たいきょ) - in force; in great numbers
大振り: (おおぶり) - somewhat large/of a larger size/on the large size; large swing (bat, racquet, etc.)/long sweeping stroke
大捕り物: (おおとりもの) - roundup (criminals, animals, etc.); manhunt; crackdown; swoop; raid
大捕物: (おおとりもの) - roundup (criminals, animals, etc.); manhunt; crackdown; swoop; raid
大掃除: (おおそうじ) - major cleanup; spring cleaning
大揚: (おおよう) - largeheartedness; liberality; catholicity; generousness; generosity; magnanimity
大政: (たいせい) - sovereign power; the reins of government
大政奉還: (たいせいほうかん) - (yoji) restoration of imperial rule
大政翼賛会: (たいせいよくさんかい) - Imperial Rule Assistance Association (1940-1945)
大教室: (だいきょうしつ) - lecture hall; lecture theatre; auditorium
大数: (たいすう) - great number; round number
大数の法則: (たいすうのほうそく) - law of large numbers
大敵: (たいてき) - great rival; powerful enemy; archenemy
大文字: (だいもんじ) - upper case letters/large characters/capital letter; (だいもんじ only) the (kanji) character "dai" meaning "big"; (だいもんじ only) huge character "dai" formed by fires lit on the side of a mountain in Kyoto on 16 Aug each year
大文字名前文字: (おおもじなまえもじ) - upper-case name characters
大文字名前開始文字: (おおもじなまえかいしもじ) - upper-case name start characters
大文字小文字を区別: (おおもじこもじをくべつ) - case-sensitivity; to distinguish on case
大新聞: (だいしんぶん) - type of newspaper from the Meiji era (characterized by its use of political commentary written in literary language); major newspaper
大方: (おおかた) - perhaps; almost all; majority
大旆: (たいはい) - banner (imperial, shogun, etc.); standard
大日: (だいにち) - Mahavairocana (Tathagata); Great Sun; Supreme Buddha of Sino-Japanese esoteric Buddhism
大日如来: (だいにちにょらい) - Vairocana; Mahavairocana (Bliss Body of the historical Gautama Buddha); Dainichi Buddha; Nyorai Buddha
大日孁貴: (おおひるめのむち) - Sun Goddess; Amaterasu Oomikami
大日本: (だいにほん) - Japan; (おおやまと only)  Yamato/ancient province corresponding to modern-day Nara Prefecture
大日本帝国: (だいにっぽんていこく) - Empire of Japan (Japan's official name under the Meiji Constitution)
大日本帝国憲法: (だいにっぽんていこくけんぽう) - Meiji Constitution (Constitution of the Empire of Japan)
大日本帝国陸軍: (だいにっぽんていこくりくぐん) - the Imperial Japanese Army
